title: Memorandum Directing Use of Available Department of War Funds to Cover Military Pay and Allowances During Lapse in Annual Appropriations
summary: This memorandum directs the Secretary of War and the Director of the Office of Management and Budget to utilize funds that remain available within the Department of War to cover the pay and allowances of military personnel during a lapse in annual appropriations. It references the current lapse in appropriations and outlines the use of available Department of War funds to ensure continued payment of military pay and allowances during the lapse period.

title: Executive Order on Federal Hiring Accountability
summary: This executive order establishes federal hiring accountability measures and outlines implementation steps for ensuring oversight of the federal hiring process. It references background context noting a reduction in the federal workforce over an eight-month period and emphasizes improving the efficiency of government service delivery while prioritizing hiring in national security. The document sets forth authorities and responsibilities across relevant agencies to maintain accountability in federal hiring practices.

title: Declaration acknowledging commitment to the Trump Peace Agreement and its implementation
summary: This presidential actions declaration acknowledges and endorses the commitment by all parties to the Trump Peace Agreement and its implementation, describing the ending of more than two years of suffering and loss in the region and the start of a period characterized by hope, security, and a shared vision for peace and prosperity. The declaration expresses support for President Trump's leadership and urges continued adherence to the agreement by all involved parties, outlining expected improvements in regional stability and prosperity.

title: Leif Erikson Day, 2025 Proclamation
summary: A presidential proclamation designating Leif Erikson Day in 2025. The proclamation recognizes Leif Erikson as the first known European to reach North America and notes the historical significance of his voyage. It acknowledges the contributions of Nordic Americans and designates Leif Erikson Day as an occasion to reflect on the history of exploration and the diverse heritage that contributed to the United States.

title: Proclamation by the President on Columbus Day, 2025
summary: This presidential proclamation designates Columbus Day 2025 and describes Christopher Columbus as a historical figure. It states that the United States observes Columbus Day on the specified date as part of the national observance associated with the holiday.

title: Presidential Memorandum Directing the Construction of Arctic Security Cutters
summary: A presidential memorandum directed to the Secretary of Homeland Security, the Director of the Office of Management and Budget, the Assistant to the President for National Security Affairs, and the Assistant to the President and Homeland Security Advisor. The document states that the President, exercising authority under the Constitution and the laws of the United States, directs planning and implementation for the construction of Arctic security cutters. The memorandum assigns interagency responsibilities for planning, budgeting, procurement, and deployment, requires coordination among relevant agencies, outlines milestones for design, funding, and construction, and directs compliance with applicable laws and regulatory processes to enable the development and deployment of new vessels intended for Arctic security operations.
